backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-coin wallet backend with transaction history, contacts, user profiles, and balance management for ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, and Infinity Coin, using access control authorization for all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: displaying native blockchain receive addresses, adding transfer mode selector, handling native on-chain transfers, and updating transaction history to distinguish transfer types.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including React components, hooks, pages, utilities, and styling for the Infinity Wallet application with neon/futuristic theme and multi-chain support.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Infinity Wallet application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Smoke test checklist covering seven primary user journeys: wallet connection, profile setup, dashboard render, navigation, send form, receive copy-to-clipboard, and contacts CRUD operations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing Internet Identity authentication flow, profile setup dialog, page routing, loading states, and error handling with theme provider and toast notifications.
Authentication button component handling Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out with loading states, error recovery, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the user's Internet Identity principal with optional truncation and a copy-to-clipboard button. Shows a styled card with the principal text and copy icon that changes to a checkmark on successful copy.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for a name input. Cannot be dismissed and saves the profile using the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Dialog component for adding or editing contacts with name and address fields. Validates recipient addresses and uses useSaveContact/useUpdateContact hooks to persist changes.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary component that catches and displays application errors with a reload button. Shows error details in an expandable section and provides a full-page error UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation bar, and content area. Provides navigation between dashboard, send, receive, contacts, history, and contracts pages with authenticated user controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Displays the application logo image with gradient text overlay and the app name. Uses branding constants and applies visual effects like shadows and gradients.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceCa: Card component displaying a single token balance with icon, name, and refresh button. Handles loading, error states, and formats the balance with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover component with searchable contact list for selecting transaction recipients. Displays contact names and truncated addresses, calling onSelect callback when a contact is chosen.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TotalAsse: Card showing total portfolio value with denomination currency selector (Infinity, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL). Currently displays balance in selected token without cross-token conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance using Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckBTC balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with extensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckBTC ledger client, creating it when identity is available and logging detailed initialization steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckETH balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with extensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckETH ledger client, creating it when identity is available and logging detailed initialization steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ckSOL balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with extensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckSOL ledger client, creating it when identity is available and logging detailed initialization steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpBalance.ts: React Query hook that fetches ICP balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user's default account with extensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpLedger.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated ICP ledger client using Internet Identity, with comprehensive console logging for debugging initialization and actor method verification.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityCoinBalanc: React Query hook that fetches Infinity Coin balance from the ICRC-1 ledger for the authenticated user, with detailed logging of account construction and balance retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityLedger.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated Infinity Coin ledger client using Internet Identity, with comprehensive debugging logs for initialization and method verification.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, transaction history, and contacts management, providing CRUD operations with automatic cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark cosmic theme featuring neon cyan, purple, and magenta accents, plus glow utilities and animated starfield background.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Constants defining application name and supported token symbols (ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, Infinity Coin).
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 client for ckBTC ledger with types, IDL factory, and createCkBtcLedgerClient function that creates an authenticated actor with debugging logs and root key fetching for local development.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckBTC ledger canister ID constant 'mxzaz-hqaaa-aaaar-qaada-cai'.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckBTC ledger configuration, client functions, and TypeScript types for external consumption.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 client for ckETH ledger with types, IDL factory, and createCkEthLedgerClient function that creates an authenticated actor with debugging logs and root key fetching for local development.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckETH ledger canister ID constant 'ss2fx-dyaaa-aaaar-qacoq-cai'.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckETH ledger configuration, client functions, and TypeScript types for external consumption.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 client for ckSOL ledger with types, IDL factory, and createCkSolLedgerClient function that creates an authenticated actor with debugging logs and root key fetching for local development.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckSOL ledger canister ID constant 'zfcdd-tqaaa-aaaaq-aaaga-cai'.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckSOL ledger configuration, client functions, and TypeScript types for external consumption.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Provides principalToAccountId function that derives ICP Ledger Account Identifier from a Principal using SHA-224 hashing and CRC32 checksum, with custom implementations of both algorithms.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/client.ts: Implements ICRC-1 client for ICP ledger with types, IDL factory, and createIcpLedgerClient function that creates an authenticated actor with debugging logs and root key fetching for local development.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/config.ts: Exports the ICP ledger canister ID constant 'ryjl3-tyaaa-aaaaa-aaaba-cai'.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ICP ledger configuration, client functions, and TypeScript types for external consumption.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/client.t: Defines ICRC-1 ledger types and interfaces, provides an IDL factory for the Infinity Coin ledger, and exports a function to create an authenticated ledger client with comprehensive debugging.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/config.t: Exports the Infinity Coin ICRC-1 ledger canister ID as a single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/index.ts: Re-exports the Infinity Coin ledger configuration, client creation functions, and TypeScript types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for CSS class merging, truncating principal strings, and formatting timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains validation functions for recipient addresses (ICP/Principal), Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana addresses, and amount parsing/formatting utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays a contact management page with add, edit, and delete functionality using custom hooks and dialog components.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Provides a UI for calling canister methods with Internet Identity authentication, currently simulating contract calls as a demo implementation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays wallet dashboard with total assets and individual token balances for Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, and ckSOL using custom balance hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays transaction history with filtering by token type, showing locally recorded transaction submissions with warnings that actual balances are controlled by ICRC-1 ledgers. Includes refresh functionality and uses token icons/labels for different coin types (INFINITY, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL).
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: Shows user's Principal address for receiving ICRC-1 tokens and chain-specific addresses (BTC, ETH, SOL) for native deposits. Displays unified addressing for all supported tokens with copy-to-clipboard functionality and loading states for chain-key addresses.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Multi-step token sending interface supporting both wrapped ICRC-1 transfers and native chain transfers (BTC, ETH, SOL). Handles validation, confirmation, and execution of transfers across multiple ledgers with error handling and transaction recording.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, glow/neon shadow effects, cosmic gradient backgrounds, and extended theme including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for a multi-chain Web3 wallet supporting BTC, ETH, and SOL with both wrapped token transfers (fast/cheap) and native on-chain conversions via chain-key integration. Contains existing features for displaying receive addresses and transfer mode selection, plus pending feature requests for generating unique addresses and implementing native coin conversion methods.
